```{r Carga datos limpios "nuestra_pelis.csv", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
scores = head(read_csv(here("Data","nuestras_pelis.csv")))
scores %<>% mutate(across(c(MovieID,UserID,Score,Release_Year), as.integer))
```

    n_month = month(Date),
